body.p:
Hd Qrs; Batt 'E' 1st Ky Light Artillery
Camp Nelson Ky. June 14"/65
Thomas E Bramlette
Govenor of Ky.
Sir,
I take great pleasure in recommending 1st Lieut S. A. Miller Batt 'E' 1st Ky Light ^Artillery^ to the vacancy created by my resignation from service as @ young, efficient and most capable officer.

I Bear witness to his good moral character, and gentlemanly qualities, also to his energy and decision of Character, and ^would^ be glad if appointed at once, believing him greatly deserving of the position

L. E. P. Bush
Capt Batt 'E' 1st Ky Light Art

Hd. Qrs. Mil. Comd't
Lexington Ky June 15/65

I heartily enLt S. A. Miller was stationed at this Post last Fall and Winter, consequently I am well acquainted with him. He is in every way qualified for the discharge of the duties of the Office of Captain. He has served his country faithfully for three years and has shown himself and efficient officer and a true patriot. I beg that he be promoted

Respectfully
S. W. Price
Col. 21st Ky
Comdg Post

Head Quarters 1st Ky
Lexington Ky June 15/65

Lieut S. A. Miller is a member of My Staff. I regard him as one of the best officers in the service & cheerfully recommend him for promotion to the Captaincy of the Battery lately Commanded by Capt Bush
